Spa menu

Body Massage When you enter a Four Seasons spa, you instantly feel transported.

From the scent in the air to the serene, locally inspired décor and warm welcome, we seek to envelop you in comfort and serenity. From there, you’ll enjoy an experience that has been carefully crafted for you, focused on the very best of local spa practices and traditions. Whether a hammam experience in Istanbul or an immersion in ayurvedic practices in the Maldives, authenticity and well-being are our guiding principles in providing you an experience you won’t forget.
